oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Step It Up And Go - Maddox Brothers And Rose performance - KWKH - Louisiana Hayride
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Step It Up And Go, performed by the Maddox Brothers And Rose on the KWKH (Shreveport, La.) Louisiana Hayride.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Maddox Brothers And Rose
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unidentified radio announcer] attempts to get Ruby [phonetic] to perform [incomplete] / (0:39) [Unidentified announcer] introduces the next performance / (1:15) The Maddox Brothers And Rose perform "Step It Up And Go" [unconfirmed] / (3:48) Horace Logan and Fred Maddox talk about Southern Maid Donuts, tell jokes, and the Jackson Brewing Company in New Orleans / (5:27) The Maddox Brothers and Rose the Jax's Beer jingle / (5:46) Fred Maddox dedicates a song to Ray Bartlett while he's in the hospital [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KWKH (Radio station : Shreveport, La.); Louisiana hayride (Radio program); Maddox Brothers & Rose; Logan, Horace
